snippet: Croatia rallied to reach the quarterfinals of the European basketball championship with a 76-68 victory over Italy in Ljubljana, Slovenia. Spain cruised past Finland, 82-56.
lead_paragraph: Croatia rallied to reach the quarterfinals of the European basketball championship with a 76-68 victory over Italy in Ljubljana, Slovenia. Spain cruised past Finland, 82-56.

headline.main: Croatia and Spain Win at European Championship
